name: Mr Anchry's Day of Twilight
description:
Mr Anchry's Day of Twilight

Another addition to the slightly acclaimed Mr.Anchry Franchise has finally arrived. Endure the Lockdown in this mildly engaging gamified simulation of the Mr. Anchry multiverse. This game is brought to you by the Stables. The ride never ends,

Created for the Orange County Lockdown Jam

Created by 

ThorGameDev

Jonrei

GBgamedev

Anchry (the one and only)
